tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cabin_availability (
    cabin_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    cabin_type VARCHAR(50),
    availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE passenger_information (
    passenger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    cabin_id INT,
    booking_reference VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE onboard_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    start_time DATETIME,
    end_time DATETIME
);

CREATE TABLE passenger_information (
  passenger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE Passenger (
  passenger_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT NOT NULL,
  cabin_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (cabin_id) REFERENCES Cabin(cabin_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CabinBooking (
  booking_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  passenger_id INT,
  cabin_id INT,
  booking_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (passenger_id) REFERENCES Passenger(passenger_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (cabin_id) REFERENCES Cabin(cabin_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PassengerActivity (
  passenger_id INT,
  activity_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (passenger_id, activity_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (passenger_id) REFERENCES Passenger(passenger_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES Activity(activity_id)
);
